nutrients: Cocoa powder, milk, chocolate syrup, sugar, whipped cream
description: A rich and creamy chocolate shake inspired by classic American diners. Made with smooth cocoa and chilled milk for a deep chocolate flavor. Perfectly blended to achieve a thick yet refreshing texture. Topped with a swirl of whipped cream for extra indulgence. Ideal as a dessert drink or a sweet mid-day treat.

nutrients: Biscoff biscuits, cream cheese, butter, sugar, caramel spread
description: A decadent cake inspired by Belgian Biscoff flavors. Layers of soft sponge and creamy caramel-infused frosting. Finished with a smooth Biscoff drip and crunchy biscuit topping. Balanced sweetness with a warm spiced undertone. A must-have for caramel and cookie lovers.

nutrients: Pancakes, fresh strawberries, cream, sugar, strawberry sauce
description: A delicate pancake stack inspired by French caf√© desserts. Soft, fluffy layers filled with fresh strawberries and cream. Lightly sweetened to let the fruit shine through. Finished with a drizzle of strawberry sauce. Perfect for brunch or a light dessert option.

nutrients: Dark chocolate, cookies, whipped cream, cake slices
description: An indulgent chocolate platter inspired by Swiss chocolate culture. Features a variety of rich chocolate-based treats. Perfect for sharing or satisfying intense chocolate cravings. Combines soft, crunchy, and creamy textures. A luxurious dessert experience on one plate.

nutrients: Matcha powder, coconut cream, sugar, plant-based milk
description: A creamy matcha-based dessert inspired by Japanese tea culture. Features a smooth matcha cream with a subtle earthy flavor and a hint of sweetness. Served with a light, airy texture and a delicate matcha aroma. A perfect balance of traditional and modern flavors. Perfect for matcha lovers seeking a refined dessert.

A tropical tart inspired by Thai mango desserts. Fresh mango pieces bring natural sweetness and brightness. Set on a crisp tart base with coconut cream. Light, refreshing, and not overly sweet. Ideal for warm days and fruit lovers.

nutrients: Cream cheese, mixed berries, sugar, graham cracker crust
description: A classic Italian-inspired cheesecake topped with a medley of fresh berries. Creamy and rich filling on a crunchy graham cracker crust. Balanced sweetness with a slight tang from the berries. A visually appealing dessert perfect for special occasions or everyday indulgence.

nutrients: Mixed berries, yogurt, milk, honey, ice
description: A refreshing berry shake inspired by Canadian fruit smoothies. Blended with a mix of fresh berries for a vibrant pink color and natural sweetness. Creamy texture from yogurt and milk, lightly sweetened with honey. Perfect for a healthy treat or post-workout refreshment.
